Name: Chan Chan
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Canadan Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Mike Shum at Fairmont Pacific Rim in Vancouver.
Nutrition: One serving of Chan Chan contains 149 calories
